#summary 32-bit JTAG Blaster

= Introduction =

32bit Blaster JTAG interface code.


= Details =

Original implementation by Rony Bershadsky and Nimrod Talmon [http://www.cs.tau.ac.il/~nimrodt5/JTAG/index.html web page link]


Features
  * Supports JTAG, ARM core, and ICE scan chains
  * UART based communication with the host
  * 4 GPIO pins used for JTAG 
   # P0.4  - clock (TCK) 
   # P0.5  - data output (TDO) 
   # P0.6  - data input (TDI) 
   # P0.28 - mode select (TMS) 
   # P0.29 - voltage reference (VREF)
